questions.question: What is a fundamental property of a PMOS transistor when a low voltage (e.g., 0V) is applied to its gate, assuming it's part of a standard CMOS logic gate?
options: It turns ON, allowing current flow between source and drain.
It turns OFF, blocking current flow between source and drain.
It acts as a high-value resistor.
It acts as a capacitor, storing charge.
It emits photons as an LED.

questions.question: What is the primary advantage of using a hardware description language (HDL) like Verilog or VHDL over schematic capture for complex digital designs?
options: It guarantees faster simulation speeds.
It directly generates the physical layout without further tools.
It enables a higher level of abstraction, modularity, and reusability for complex systems.
It significantly reduces the design's static power consumption.
It automatically performs timing closure and optimization.

questions.question: Which type of parallelism is primarily exploited by a Single Instruction, Multiple Data (SIMD) architecture in a processor?
options: Instruction-Level Parallelism (ILP)
Thread-Level Parallelism (TLP)
Data-Level Parallelism (DLP)
Process-Level Parallelism (PLP)
Memory-Level Parallelism (MLP)

questions.question: In the semiconductor manufacturing process, what is the primary purpose of Chemical Mechanical Planarization (CMP)?
options: To deposit thin films of insulating material onto the wafer.
To create intricate patterns on the wafer using lithography.
To precisely remove material and create a highly flat and smooth surface across the wafer for subsequent layer deposition.
To implant dopants into the silicon substrate for conductivity modification.
To selectively etch away unwanted material from the wafer surface.

questions.question: In modern CPU architectures, what is the primary functional role of the Memory Management Unit (MMU)?
options: To optimize the execution order of instructions in the pipeline.
To translate virtual memory addresses generated by the CPU into physical memory addresses.
To manage the coherency of data across multiple processor caches.
To perform high-speed floating-point arithmetic operations.
To control the flow of data between the CPU and I/O devices.
